fields.options:
We thank you for your completed Proposal Form and now have pleasure in enclosing our Quotation for your consideration.

The Insured Percentage has been set at 85%, being the level of indemnity payable in the event of a claim and the Maximum Liability at US$25.00, being the maximum amount that will be paid in any one insurance year. The figure is however, adjustable in keeping with your export performance.

We are pleased to advise that we will be in a position to cover your Buyer. Should our Quotation be acceptable to yourselves, kindly sign and return one copy of the enclosed Acceptance Advice together with your payment of US$1,000.00 in respect of Deposit Premium and Revenue Stamps. The Deposit Premium will be credited to your account, and will be offset against any future premiums raised. The premium payable can be worked out by applying the rates set out on the Schedule to the Specimen Policy onto the monthly declared shipments, depending on the payment terms.

We trust the above is in order and look forward to your further advices in due course.

Yours faithfully
for CREDSURE
